Meraj Khan <merajak@y...> replied:
> Please do that.

So I have.  The file is "consoletester.zip", and contains the
utility class itself (ConsoleTester), its unit tests, 
a simple console application, and a test for the simple app that
uses ConsoleTester.

Hope someone finds some use from it!

Cheers,
